steps.value: Given I am on main application page
When I change window size to `${resolution}`
When I go to relative URL `/my-cases`
When I wait until element located by `caseSensitiveText(There are no cases at the moment.)` appears
When I click on element located by `tagName(button)->filter.textPart(Create New Case)`
When I wait until element located by `caseSensitiveText(Select Case Type)` appears
Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is ((equal to)) `/new-case`

scenarios.title: check create new episode of care button

steps.value: When I go to relative URL `/new-case`
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-new-case-card-button)->filter.index(1)`
When I wait until element located by `testId(jnj-save-button)` appears
Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is ((equal to)) `/new-case/episode-of-care`
When I enter `#{generate(regexify '[0-9]{8}')}` in field located by `fieldName(patientId)`
When I enter `#{generate(Name.firstName)}` in field located by `fieldName(firstName)`
When I enter `#{generate(Name.lastName)}` in field located by `fieldName(lastName)`
When I enter `#{randomInt(1, 30)}` in field located by `fieldName(bmi)`
When I click on element located by `xpath(//*[@aria-label='Choose date'])`
When I click on element located by `xpath(//*[@aria-current='date'])`
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-patient-form-gender)`
When I click on element located by `xpath(//*[@role='option'])->filter.index(#{generate(regexify '[1-3]')})`

scenarios.title: Second check surgery section

steps.value: Given I am on main application page
When I change window size to `${resolution}`
When I go to relative URL `/my-cases`
When I wait until element located by `caseSensitiveText(There are no cases at the moment.)` appears
When I click on element located by `tagName(button)->filter.textPart(Create New Case)`
When I wait until element located by `caseSensitiveText(Select Case Type)` appears
Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is ((equal to)) `/new-case`

scenarios.title: check create new episode of care button

steps.value: When I go to relative URL `/new-case`
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-new-case-card-button)->filter.index(1)`
When I wait until element located by `testId(jnj-save-button)` appears
Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is ((equal to)) `/new-case/episode-of-care`
When I change context to element located `xpath(//*[@data-test-id='jnj-surgery-user-name']/div[1])`
Then number of elements found by `xpath(//input[@id='surgery-user-name-field' and @disabled])` is ((=)) `1`
When I change context to element located `xpath(//*[@data-test-id='jnj-surgery-form-operating-room'])`
When I change context to element located `xpath(//*[@data-test-id='jnj-surgery-add-date']/span[1])`
When I click on element located `xpath(//*[@data-test-id='jnj-surgery-add-date'])`
Then field located `xpath(//*[@data-test-id='jnj-surgery-form-time'])` exists
Then field located `xpath(//*[@data-test-id='jnj-surgery-form-estimated-duration'])` exists
When I change context to element located `id(Surgery)`
When I ((${visual-action})) baseline with name `${profile}-${resolution}-surgery-section`

scenarios.title: Second  check left bar complete state of patient section

steps.value: When I change context to element located by `testId(jnj-vertical-stepper)`

When I ((${visual-action})) baseline with name `${profile}-${resolution}-new-case-left-bar-complete-patient` using screenshot configuration:
|shootingStrategy|cutRight               |
|SIMPLE          |${context-x-coordinate}|
When I reset context
